meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Franke Santos Craig Cornish, Jr. Carlos Ross Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6725.

td.p: Franke Santos, an operations manager from North Hollywood, California
Craig Cornish, Jr., a graduate student of history from Welcome, Maryland
Carlos Ross, a customer service representative from Austin, Texas (whose 3-day cash winnings total $89,774)

tr.td: "B" WHERE?
(Alex: Each correct response beginning with the letter "B".)
METALS
YOU'VE GOT TASTE
A FASHION STATEMENT
CHIPS
THE GRAMMYS: BEST MALE POP VOCAL

Craig

$3,000

tr.td: HISTORIC LETTERS
In April 1865 she wrote to Mary Lincoln, "I cannot remain silent... brokenhearted by the loss of my own beloved husband"
Carlos
Craig
Franke

New champion: $19,000
2nd place: $2,000

Craig
Franke

(including 2 DDs),
